pageProduct.name: Optive Fusion Eye Drops 10mL
pageProduct.description:
Information

General Information

Optive Fusion Lubricant Eye Drops hydrates and protects dry eyes.

Combination formula to provide instant relief or dry, irritated and gritty eyes.
 
- Helps maintain hydration. 
- Provides sustained protection. 
- Promotes eye surface restoration. 
- Compatible with contact lenses. 

Compatible with contact lenses. May be used as a protectant against further irritation. 

Suitable For: Dry, irritated and gritty eyes.

Size: 10mL

Warnings

Do not use if solution changes colour.

CAUTION

Keep out of reach of children. To avoid contamination, do not touch tip of container to any surface. Replace cap after use. Discontinue use and consult a doctor if you experience eye pain, changes in vision, continued redness or irritation of the eye, or if the condition worsens or persists for more than 72 hours. Discard 3 months after opening.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Contents are sterile if imprinted seal around cap is intact.

Ingredients

Contains: Each mL contains:5mg carmellose sodium.9mg glycerin, 1mg sodium hyaluronate. 0.1mg PURITE (preservative).

Directions

Instil 1 or 2 drops in the affected eye(s) as needed. Can be used as often as needed. Can be used for up to 3 months from opening.

USAGE ADVICE

Compatible with contact lenses. May be used as a protectant against further irritation. For external use only.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C.

Storage Temperature: Below 25°C.
